content.description: A mixture of diethyl ether, ethanoic acid, and hexane is separated using a thin-layer chromatography experiment. The Lewis diagrams of the compounds in the mixture and the results of the experiment are shown. A student determines the identity of the compound in each spot shown.
content.question: Based on this information, which of the following conclusions can be drawn about the polarity of the stationary phase and mobile phase used in this experiment?

choices.label:
Stationary Phase
 Mobile Phase

Nonpolar
 Polar

Stationary Phase
 Mobile Phase

Nonpolar
 Nonpolar

Stationary Phase
 Mobile Phase

Polar
 Polar

Stationary Phase
 Mobile Phase

Polar
 Nonpolar

content.answer:
Stationary Phase
 Mobile Phase

Polar
 Nonpolar

skill.text: 6.F: Explain the connection between experimental results and chemical concepts, processes, or theories.
